statements: UPDATE market_trends_gmo SET consumer_preference = 'High' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE market_trends_gmo SET market_trend = 'Declining', date_recorded = '2022-06-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE market_trends_gmo SET consumer_preference = 'High' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE market_trends_gmo SET market_trend = 'Declining', consumer_preference = 'Low' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE market_trends SET market_price = 15.99, market_demand = 500 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE consumer_preferences SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Great product quality' WHERE consumer_id = 201;
UPDATE market_trends SET market_price = 1500.50, market_demand = 100 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE consumer_preferences SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Excellent product' WHERE consumer_id = 201 AND product_id = 101;
UPDATE MarketTrends SET market_segment = 'Electronics' WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone';
UPDATE ConsumerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Excellent product, highly recommended' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE MarketTrends SET market_segment = 'Tech Gadgets' WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone';
UPDATE ProductSales SET quantity = quantity + 1, price = price * 1.1 WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE Market_Trends SET market_demand = 500 WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone';
UPDATE Consumer_Preferences SET purchase_history = '{"2022": ["Product A", "Product B"]}' WHERE consumer_id = 123;
UPDATE Market_Trends SET market_demand = 500 WHERE product_name = 'Smartphones';
UPDATE Consumer_Preferences SET purchase_history = '{"2021":"iPhone 12 Pro Max","2022":"Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra"}' WHERE consumer_id = 123;
UPDATE MarketTrends SET market_share = 25.75 WHERE id = '7a7d0f80-0f66-4e16-b3f5-811d2366c4e5';
UPDATE SupplierInformation SET location = 'New York', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 'e1141ffd-bc79-4979-a1cb-72b18968f7fd';
UPDATE MarketTrends SET market_share = 30.50, trend_description = 'Positive trend in Q3 sales' WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE ProductDetails SET price = 120.00, expiry_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
